items.name: func comboBoxCell(NSComboBoxCell, completedString: String) -> String?
items.desc: Returns the item from the combo box's pop-up list that matches the text entered by the user.

items.name: func comboBoxCell(NSComboBoxCell, indexOfItemWithStringValue: String) -> Int
items.desc: Invoked by an NSComboBoxCell object to synchronize the pop-up list’s selected item with the text field’s contents.

items.name: func comboBoxCell(NSComboBoxCell, objectValueForItemAt: Int) -> Any
items.desc: Returns the object that corresponds to the item at the given index in the combo box cell.

items.name: func numberOfItems(in: NSComboBoxCell) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the number of items managed for the combo box cell by your data source object.
